channel.description:

[/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=7][B][U]Beta Confirmed for May 1st 2015![/U][/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Sign up here: [URL=http://rezemblance.com/register.php]http://rezemblance.com/register.php[/URL] If you sign up now you will get bonus items on release day! If we get 1000 sign-ups by release day we will give every member double bonus items! Tell your friends and get excited! :D[/SIZE] [/CENTER]

item.title: ReZemblance-Balanced Economy, Unique, Constant Updates - Excellence Redefined
item.dc:creator: @ReZemblance ReZemblance
item.description:
@ReZemblance wrote:

[quote=“CSharp95, post:5, topic:551198”][quote author=ReZemblance link=topic=670114.msg4480965#msg4480965 date=1429731476]
Thanks for the reply!

1: I’ve fixed the link, thank you for informing me.
2. Advertising the community allows for more players to join and become part of what is better than the norm. Good attitudes spread between good people quickly :).
3. If you’re referring to the picture stating the key points of the beta, it is meant to be so - thank you though :).

Thank you for the reply and thank you for the suggestions. They have been noted. Glad to hear you’re considering signing up, we hope to see you soon!
[/quote]
What makes no sense to me is how promoting your server makes the community better.
It potentially makes your community more populated, but I don’t see it helping the community as a whole.[/quote]

The point of this post isn’t to make the community better, the point of this post is to make users aware of what we are aiming towards.

Read full topic
item.source: ReZemblance-Balanced Economy, Unique, Constant Updates - Excellence Redefined

@CSharp95 wrote:

[quote=“ReZemblance, post:3, topic:551198”]Thanks for the reply!

1: I’ve fixed the link, thank you for informing me.
2. Advertising the community allows for more players to join and become part of what is better than the norm. Good attitudes spread between good people quickly :).
3. If you’re referring to the picture stating the key points of the beta, it is meant to be so - thank you though :).

Thank you for the reply and thank you for the suggestions. They have been noted. Glad to hear you’re considering signing up, we hope to see you soon![/quote]
What makes no sense to me is how promoting your server makes the community better.
It potentially makes your community more populated, but I don’t see it helping the community as a whole.

item.title: ReZemblance-Balanced Economy, Unique, Constant Updates - Excellence Redefined
item.dc:creator: @ReZemblance ReZemblance
item.description:
@ReZemblance wrote:

Thanks for the reply!

1: I’ve fixed the link, thank you for informing me.
2. Advertising the community allows for more players to join and become part of what is better than the norm. Good attitudes spread between good people quickly :).
3. If you’re referring to the picture stating the key points of the beta, it is meant to be so - thank you though :).

Thank you for the reply and thank you for the suggestions. They have been noted. Glad to hear you’re considering signing up, we hope to see you soon!

item.title: ReZemblance-Balanced Economy, Unique, Constant Updates - Excellence Redefined
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

  1. The first link is broken
  2. How will advertising your server make this community any better?
  3. One of the pictures is off center

Impressive thread though, it certainly has more effort put into it than most. It’s refreshing even though the yellow text was quite hard to read. I’ll think about signing up.

Read full topic
